name: 11resapi
description: Rest APIs or Restfull APIs 1- server client architecture 2- client request for something to the server 3- server do some db changes 4- then server sends a response to the client (html docs -> server side rendering), image, text, etc.  5- but, html docs is good for the browser what about alexa device, there is something different to be sent to alexa so as to process our data. 6- if there any device which wants that it should be json, then send json as response. 7- always respects all http methods GET POST, PUT, delete, patch.     1- GET/USER - users data read kro and return data     2- POST/USER - handle new user creation     3- PATCH/USER - update to existing user
